title: Rose Theatre Kingston - Font
content:
Hello can anyone tell me what this font used for ROSE THEATRE KINGSTON is please? Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020203608/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_60.png) | 248.78 KB |
author: acantwell

comments.content: Close... the R in poplar is similar with the flick at the bottom, but the font appears more uniform than poplar I think. Cheers for suggesting!
